column4: hello..got a question..i installed a new wifi card to my desktop and i can't seem to get it to work.  i've tried a few things, but now it reads "device not managed"
have you installed the drivers for it?
i was able to get the "activity" light to work, now it doesn't even come on.  At boot it hangs...using Crunchbang 9.04...
what hangs the OS?  Did you or did you not install the drivers?
can you hit alt+F2 at the splash and see what is causing errors?
cool, but no...won't get past wpa password now...
have you used this wireless AP w/ your system before
try starting w/ no security ... moving up to WEP and then moving to WPA
I've found that my card doesn't like certain types of WPA
do you have access to your router?
yes, but,  i'll have to continue with this later.  thanks for the try though, bud...
